participant_1.background:
I think it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor because they can afford it and it would help to reduce the disparity between the rich and the poor.
I would love to have lunch with a koala on my ranch.
I've been secretly watching baseball games all year, even though my parents don't like it.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.
I wake up early and greet my family with a wagging tail.

participant_2.background:
I read fantasy novels to escape my reality.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can be myself and not be judged for my music taste or my dreams.
I broke my leg when I was a kid, but I'm all better now!
i work at a grocery store.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.

content.text: Morning! What is your favorite fantasy novel?
Good morning! The Name of the Wind by Patrick Rothfuss is one of my favorites!
I have heard great things about that book! What do you like about it?
I love the story and the characters. It is a very well written book.
I will have to add that to my list of books to read! I have been looking for something new to read.
I am sure you will enjoy it! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to read, go for walks, and spend time with my family.
Those are all great things to do! I like to read, go for walks, and play video games.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play adventure games, action games, and puzzle games.
Those are all great genres! I like to play adventure games and action games.
It sounds like we have similar interests!
Yes, it does! It would be fun to get together and play some video games sometime.
That would be fun! I would love to play some video games with you.
Great! I will send you a message and we can set up a time to play.
